column1: In  opposing  of appeal  learned  DSG  submits  that  the  evidence  was

overwhelming 
to  support the  conviction  by the  learned  trial  Judge where
does  not  appear  to  be  any  reason  by  the  legal  or  factual  to  reverse  the

findings  of the  learned  trial  Judge. 
In  the  circumstances  with  regard  to

the  evidence  of this  case 
and 
conclusion  of the  learned  trial judge, 
to

affirm  the  conviction  and  uphold  the  sentence 
imposed  on  the  accused
